snippet: As a teenager, Jonathan Diaz danced for money on New York City’s streets and subway trains. He has switched to acting, while trying to mend a relationship whose rupture left him out on his own.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Jonathan Diaz of Bronx buy furniture for shared apartment he hopes will help him start new life.
lead_paragraph: As a teenager, Jonathan Diaz danced for money on New York City’s streets and subway trains. He has switched to acting, while trying to mend a relationship whose rupture left him out on his own.

headline.print_headline: Break Dancer Finds Footing While Trying to Heal a Rift
